title: Ep 10: Meal of Approval with Jenny Han
itunes:title: Ep 10: Meal of Approval with Jenny Han
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree discuss the struggle that is meal planning, and talk about strategies to cope. Then they get YA author Jenny Han (The Summer I Turned Pretty series, the To All the Boys I've Loved Before trilogy) to share her baking secrets...
description:
Kate and Doree discuss the struggle that is meal planning, and talk about strategies to cope. Then they get YA author Jenny Han (The Summer I Turned Pretty series, the To All the Boys I've Loved Before trilogy) to share her baking secrets, as well as her skincare regimen and her favorite lipsticks.

For more info and a list of products mentioned on this week's episode, visit forever35podcast.com. You can also join the Forever35 Facebook group, follow the podcast on Instagram and Twitter, and send Kate and Doree an email at forever35podcast@gmail.com. And now you can call them and leave a voicemail at 781-591-0390!

This episode is sponsored by Thrive Market. To save $60 on your first three orders, plus a 30-day free trial and free shipping, visit thrivemarket.com/forever35.

Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
